articles.title: GMM Pfaudler Block Deal: Pfaudler Inc sells 13.56% stake - Here are the buyers - CNBCTV18
articles.description: In multiple block deals, almost 58 lakh shares of GMM Pfaudler, translating into 13 percent of its equity, changed hands via open market transactions. No immediate information was available about the buyers and sellers in the deals.
